trans-unit.source: Represents a collection that contains operation descriptions.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is used to describe the contract for a service, including the associated operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> 是用於描述服務的合約，包括有關聯的作業。

trans-unit.source: The operations are accessed from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Operations%2A> property which returns the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection> for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 作業是從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Operations%2A> 屬性存取，該屬性會傳回合約的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Each contract operation has a corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply.
trans-unit.target: 每個合約作業都有對應的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> 描述作業的各個部分，例如作業是單向的或要求/回覆。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in turn describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 每個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> 也會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> 的集合描述組成作業的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the operation.
Returns an operation description with a specified name from the collection of operation descriptions.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> with the name specified.
This method returns the first occurrence of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in the collection with the name specified.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回集合中第一個出現具有指定名稱的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> objects in the collection use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要尋找集合中所有的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> 物件，請改用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the operation.
Returns a collection of all the operation descriptions from the collection that have the specified name.

The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that contains the operation descriptions with the specified name.
<paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The zero-based index at which <c>item</c> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to insert.
Inserts an element into the operation description collection at the specified index.
This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會提供給 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 系統來執行輸入驗證，而且不應該由使用者呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The zero-based index at which <c>item</c> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to set.
Replaces the operation description element in the collection at the specified index.
This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會提供給 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 系統來執行輸入驗證，而且不應該由使用者呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
